documents.name: Cookie Policy
documents.text:
Polarsteps Track and share your journeys in an easy and beautiful way, turning your travel moments into lifetime memories.

Explore. Dream. Discover.

We help you track and share your journeys in an easy and beautiful way, turning your travel moments into lifetime memories.

Easily track your travels

The path you take automatically plotted on a vibrant map, keeping your phone in your pocket and your eyes on the world.

Put loved ones in the passenger seat

Bring the adventure to life for those back at home by showing them where you are and what the experience is truly like.

Much more than a photo album

Your unique memories in a beautiful hardback Travel Book — create with the push of a button, keep forever.

Won’t drain your battery

Full privacy control

Tracking that works offline

Easy as pie to use

points.title: Your Personal data may be sold unless you opt out
points.status: We don’t sell your personal data and by default your settings are privacy friendly.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
points.status: You have the right to access, correction or erasure of your data. You can also ask us to restrict the processing or transfer your personal data and you have the right to object to the processing of your personal data.

points.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
points.status: You acknowledge that all Content accessed by you using the Service is at your own risk and you will be solely responsible and liable for any damage or loss to you or any other party resulting therefrom.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
points.status: Polarsteps cannot guarantee the authenticity of any Content or data, which users may provide about themselves.

points.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services
points.status: You acknowledge and accept that by making the Content available through the Service, you automatically and free of charge grant Polarsteps an unlimited, worldwide, irrevocable, sublicensable and transferable license to reproduce, distribute, redistribute, modify, translate, adapt, prepare derivative works, display and otherwise use all or part of the Content, by any and all means, in the context of providing the Service and/or our business activities, and within the limits of the privacy settings you have chosen for your content.
